comment: Very buggy recently. Does not show pin yin during chinese translations, tap to translate has persistent notif, screen shifts when accessing translate Update 03/03/2020: understand tap to translate security removal. But the fact that pin yin does not show in translationa from Chinese to eng still an issue. Also, when tapping text entry area, the area moves to the top of the screen with a slow animation, increasing user friction.
scenarios: Pin yin does not show during Chinese to English translations.
Tap to translate has a persistent notification.
Screen shifts when accessing the translate feature.
Text entry area moves to the top of the screen with a slow animation when tapped.
key sentence: Text entry area moves to the top of the screen with a slow animation when tapped.
